page.title: 17INDUSTRY IN THE AREA
page.content: The largest factory is at Pipe Gate. It is now the{Phoenix Rubber Company, which manufactures and recycles PVC plastic materials. It used to be a{dairy for handling the milk from the surrounding farms, but now the tankers take the milk mainly to Crudgington. It was a sensible place to put a factory because it was right against the railway. On the Newcastle Road nearly into Onneley is Salopian Kenneth Hudson. This used to be a factory for farm implements, but it is{now just a {storage depot. Old directories show that there used to be a brickworks at Pipe Gate, a smithy in Woore, and a tailor. There was a builder at Irelands Cross. Now there is just a blacksmith/farrier at Knighton.
